review: What can I say? One of the best games I've played in 2015. :^)Highlights:- VERY Earthbound esque- Minimalistic, but amazingly beautiful scenery.- THE PLOT.- Spagehetti.- The characters.10/10 game. A lot of thought went into Undertale and I've heavily enjoyed the game.
